name: warracker
description: Warracker is a self-hosted tracker for game achievements or war reports, collecting stats and presenting them in dashboards and leaderboards via a browser interface.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View comprehensive stats including completion rates, playtime, and progress metrics

features.title: Game Library
features.description: Maintain a catalog of games with completion status, ratings, and personal notes

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: See achievement progress with charts and graphs showing completion percentages over time

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Track achievements from Steam, PlayStation, Xbox, and other gaming platforms simultaneously

features.title: Activity Feed
features.description: View recent achievements and updates from tracked players in a chronological timeline
